General.Name: Shanghai Ace Invest&Dvlp Co
General.Description: Shanghai Ace Investment&Development Co.,Ltd engages in the supply chain logistics and supply chain execution trading businesses in China. The company offers multimodal transport of railways, highways, and waterways; and third-party logistics services. It also provides warehouses, bulk cargo yards, container operation stations, liquid chemical storage tanks, warehousing and processing centers, and other logistics facilities. In addition, the company offers transport fleets, loading and unloading equipment, and dry bulk self-contained containers services. Further, the company provides logistics and trade services of sulfur, fertilizers, non-ferrous metals, mineral products, and other goods. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 855 Pudong South Road, Shanghai, China, 200120
